name: Ext_R5_MedicationDispense_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationDispense.medication for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.medication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Identifies the medication supplied. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the medication supplied. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept identifying which substance or product can be dispensed.
